query.pigql: totalAttach = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledgeAttached.Alias}"; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Vote_Stat_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(View_Count_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Data_Category_Select.selection, ["ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryName"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryName")}}; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(DatCategory_Group_Select.selection, ["ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryGroupName"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryGroupName")}}; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_InternalChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_PartnerChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_CustomerChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_PublicChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb")}}; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Publish_Article_Select.selection, ["ArticleVersion.PublishStatus"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.PublishStatus")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Article_Owner_Select.selection, ["User.Name"]).asEquality("Article.User.Name")}}; citation = filter totalAttach by isAttachedByOwner == "false"; citationAttach = group totalAttach by all,citation by all ; citationPercent = foreach citationAttach generate count(citation)/count(totalAttach) as unique_percent;

totalAttach = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledgeAttached.Alias}"; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Data_Category_Select.selection, ["ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryName"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryName")}}; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(DatCategory_Group_Select.selection, ["ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryGroupName"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.DataCategory.DataCategoryGroupName")}}; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_InternalChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_PartnerChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_CustomerChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(select_PublicChannel.selection, ["ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb")}}; totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Publish_Article_Select.selection, ["ArticleVersion.PublishStatus"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.PublishStatus")}};totalAttach = filter totalAttach by {{column(Article_Owner_Select.selection, ["User.Name"]).asEquality("Article.User.Name")}};  this_week = group totalAttach by 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title'; this_week = foreach this_week generate 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title' as 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title', count() as count, rank() over([..] partition by all order by count() desc) as 'Rank This Week'; last_week = group totalAttach by 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title'; last_week = foreach last_week generate 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title' as 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title', count() as count, rank() over([..] partition by all order by count() desc) as 'Rank Last Week'; combined = group this_week by 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title' left, last_week by 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title'; combined = foreach combined generate this_week['Article.ArticleVersion.Title'] as 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title', sum(this_week['Rank This Week']) as 'Rank This Week', sum(this_week['count']) as 'Count This Week', sum(last_week['count']) as 'Count Last Week',sum(last_week['Rank Last Week']) as 'Rank Last Week'; combined = order combined by 'Rank This Week'; combined = filter combined by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}};combined = filter combined by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}};

Knowledge_Article_Table.query: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledge.Alias}"; r = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledgeAttached.Alias}";q = filter q by {{column(View_Count_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("ArticleVersion.Title")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Vote_Stat_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("ArticleVersion.Title")}};  r = filter r by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.result, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}}; r = filter r by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}}; s = cogroup q by ('Id','ArticleVersion.Title') full, r by ('KnowledgeArticleId','Article.ArticleVersion.Title'); s = foreach s generate (case when ("{{cell(Case_Reason_Select.selection, 0, "Case.Reason").asObject()}}"!= ""  ||  "{{cell(Case_Product_Select.selection, 0, "Case.${Constants.CaseProduct}").asObject()}}"!= "" ||  "{{cell(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, 0, "Article.ArticleVersion.Title").asObject()}}"!= "") then r['Article.ArticleVersion.Title'] else q['ArticleVersion.Title'] end) as 'Article Title', q['Id'] as 'Id', first(q['User.Name']) as 'Article Creator',first(q['ArticleVersion.PublishStatus']) as 'Publish Status',first(q['ArticleVersion.VersionNumber']) as 'Version Number',first(q['ChannelList']) as 'Channel List',first(q['CreatedDate']) as 'Created Date',first(q['LastPublishedDate']) as 'Last Published Date', count(q) as 'count'; s = filter s by 'Article Title' is not null;

query.pigql: totalArticles = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledge.Alias}"; attachedArticles = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledgeAttached.Alias}";totalArticles = filter totalArticles by {{column(View_Count_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("ArticleVersion.Title")}}; totalArticles = filter totalArticles by {{column(Vote_Stat_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("ArticleVersion.Title")}};  attachedArticles = filter attachedArticles by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.result, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}}; attachedArticles = filter attachedArticles by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}}; combined = cogroup totalArticles by 'ArticleVersion.Title' full, attachedArticles by 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title'; combined = foreach combined generate (case when ("{{cell(Case_Reason_Select.selection, 0, "Case.Reason").asObject()}}"!= "all"  ||  "{{cell(Case_Product_Select.selection, 0, "Case.${Constants.CaseProduct}").asObject()}}"!= "all" ||  "{{cell(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, 0, "Article.ArticleVersion.Title").asObject()}}"!= "all") then attachedArticles['Article.ArticleVersion.Title'] else totalArticles['ArticleVersion.Title'] end) as 'ArticleVersion.Title',sum(totalArticles['VoteStat.NormalizedScore']) as 'sum_VoteStat.NormalizedScore'; combined = filter combined by not('ArticleVersion.Title' is null); combined = order combined by 'sum_VoteStat.NormalizedScore' desc;

totalArticles = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledge.Alias}"; attachedArticles = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceKnowledgeAttached.Alias}";totalArticles = filter totalArticles by {{column(View_Count_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("ArticleVersion.Title")}}; totalArticles = filter totalArticles by {{column(Vote_Stat_Normalized_Chart.selection, ["ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("ArticleVersion.Title")}}; attachedArticles = filter attachedArticles by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.result, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}}; attachedArticles = filter attachedArticles by {{column(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, ["Article.ArticleVersion.Title"]).asEquality("Article.ArticleVersion.Title")}}; combined = cogroup totalArticles by 'ArticleVersion.Title' full, attachedArticles by 'Article.ArticleVersion.Title'; combined = foreach combined generate (case when ("{{cell(Case_Reason_Select.selection, 0, "Case.Reason").asObject()}}"!= "all"  ||  "{{cell(Case_Product_Select.selection, 0, "Case.${Constants.CaseProduct}").asObject()}}"!= "all" ||  "{{cell(Article_Attached_Count_Chart.selection, 0, "Article.ArticleVersion.Title").asObject()}}"!= "all") then attachedArticles['Article.ArticleVersion.Title'] else totalArticles['ArticleVersion.Title'] end) as 'ArticleVersion.Title', sum(totalArticles['ViewStat.ViewCount']) as 'sum_ViewStat.ViewCount'; combined = filter combined by not('ArticleVersion.Title' is null); combined = order combined by 'sum_ViewStat.ViewCount' desc;
